Plot: Pre-teen jungle boy Mowgli gets to human world and is pursued by P.T.Barnum circus scout Harrison who wants to take him to circus as curiosity. Harrison hires local grandee Buldeo for help ...
Title: The Second Jungle Book: Mowgli & Baloo
Writer: Matthew Horton, Bayard Johnson, Rudyard Kipling (novel)
Actors: Gulshan Grover, Jamie Williams, Billy Campbell, Roddy McDowall
